ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LD50 MALLARD, (FEMALE 3-4 MO OLD), ORAL 12.0 MG/KG (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 8.65-16.5 MG/KG) /SAMPLE PURITY 98%/
LC50 Salmo gairdneri (rainbow trout) 0.2 mg/l/96 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Goldfish >10 mg/l/24 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Pteronarcy, second year class, 0.0001 mg/l/96 hr at 16 °C (95% confidence limit 0.00009-0.00012 mg/l) Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (rainbow trout), wt 1.4 g, 0.14 mg/l/96 hr at 12 °C (95% confidence limit 0.11-0.18 mg/l) Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill), wt 0.8 g, 0.22 mg/l/96 hr at 24 °C (95% confidence limit 0.15-0.33 mg/l) Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.
